attributes.action: Screen  every british soldier and ex british soldier  for P.T.S.D.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
there are so many soldiers with p.t.s.d. that  have not been diagnoised .
every british soldier and ex british soldier  should be screened for p.t.s.d. and  given all the  help  they need with p.t.s.d. illness .The soldiers should be screened    before leaving the service and screened  every three years after they have left the services . which as to be paid for by our british government
